column4: apt-get errors that it can't resolve the server at us.archive.ubuntu.com
is this down, or is it just me?
Then your DNS server might be down... How about this: host us.archive.ubuntu.com 4.2.2.3
Can you try, for example, 'host google.com'?
It really shouldn't be related to that.
Do you know how to troubleshoot internet?
Anyway, if ifconfig doesn't list anything else than loopback, you need to configure the network interface... do you use DHCP?
I don't know what I mean anymore.
it says it bound to something
Now type 'ifconfig eth0' and see if it lists an IP address.
I now have an IP from my router. ^_^
